page.title: 04FAMILY LIFE
page.content: Most of the children in our area live in Shanklin and come from a two parent family. Most parents have two or more children in their family and a pet of some kind. Many mothers have seasonal jobs during the Summer and most fathers work all the year round. School children either walk or cycle to school and half have school dinners.School children have mostly cooked meals when they arrive home from school(some eat theirs in the evening).50% of children do their homework before watching television. Children go to bed at around 9-10pm. Most mothers do the housework and cooking.Few children go to church with their parents on Sundays.Most parents don't work on Sundays.
